content: Before my life took a giant change in 1995 everything seemed to be easy. Things came and went in my life, but it didn’t matter I just rolled on. When 1995 came and I went on my sabbatical for 10 years I learned not only a great deal about others but more about me. I learned to be humble and play nice. Simply stated playing nice is the best for of living that I can describe as a way to live a good life. I know it sounds corny and too simple, but I found it to be the perfect and easiest way to explain life to my grandkids, kids, and others when I speak at events.
